entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:43 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 7:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow or ice pellets before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
